title: Clash team ( silver 4 - bronze 3) OCE server
body: looking for a clash team. currently silver 5. peaked bronze 2 in season 7. i'm a mid ( lux, karthus, talon, swain) and adc (mf, kaisa, twitch) main. reply below if interested. will check and then add you.
